Uses of Package
ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.control

  • Packages that use ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.control 
    Package Description
    ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.control
    Converting input to output values
    ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.devices
    Input Devices (Sensors) and Output Devices
    ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.guidence.imu.sensors
    Sensors which are updating the parameters.
    ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.guidence.navigation
    Navigation with the help of the Compass or with the GPS
    ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.integration
    Additional Functionality which integrates with external systems
    ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.loop
    Different alternative implementations for managing the control loop
    ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.modes
    Implementation of different Flight Modes
    ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.protocols
    Integration to drive the Hardware of the Raspberry PI using I2C, SPI and PWM
    ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.tests
    Unit tests
    ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.tuning
    Automatic PID Tunining

  • Classes in ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.control used by ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.devices 
    Class and Description
    IFrequency 
    IScaler
    Convert Input to Output
    PIDController
    Small, easy to use PID implementation with advanced controller capability.
    Minimal usage:
    MiniPID pid = new MiniPID(p,i,d);
    ...looping code...{
    output= pid.getOutput(sensorvalue,target);
    }

    output= pid.getOutput(sensorvalue,target);
